normalised: **Automotive News: Boosting Fuel Efficiency – A Guide for the Indian Driver**

unnormalised: New Delhi – With rising petrol prices, fuel efficiency is top-of-mind for Indian car buyers. Dr. Meena Iyer, Head of Automotive Engineering at IIT Madras, highlights simple steps to improve mileage.
normalised: New Delhi – With rising petrol prices, fuel efficiency is top-of-mind for Indian car buyers. Doctor Meena Iyer, Head of Automotive Engineering at I I T Madras, highlights simple steps to improve mileage.

unnormalised: Firstly, maintain your vehicle. Regular servicing ensures optimal engine performance. Secondly, check tyre pressure; under-inflated tyres increase rolling resistance. Drive smoothly; avoid sudden acceleration and braking which guzzle fuel.
normalised: Firstly, maintain your vehicle. Regular servicing ensures optimal engine performance. Secondly, check tyre pressure; under-inflated tyres increase rolling resistance. Drive smoothly; avoid sudden acceleration and braking which guzzle fuel.

unnormalised: Consider smaller, lighter cars if practicality allows. Models with advanced technologies like start-stop systems and hybrid powertrains are also beneficial. Carpooling, especially in congested cities like Mumbai and Bangalore, also helps.
normalised: Consider smaller, lighter cars if practicality allows. Models with advanced technologies like start-stop systems and hybrid powertrains are also beneficial. Carpooling, especially in congested cities like Mumbai and Bangalore, also helps.

unnormalised: Beyond personal vehicles, initiatives are underway to promote ethanol-blended petrol, aiming to reduce India's dependence on imported crude oil. The government offers subsidies for electric vehicle purchases. Saving fuel saves Rs. and contributes to a cleaner environment – a win-win for everyone. A well-maintained parking spot of 150 sq ft can prevent dings that lead to future repairs impacting efficiency. Remember, even small adjustments in driving habits can make a significant difference, potentially adding several km per liter.
